heading: Welcome
text: course contains materials learn data acquisition wrangling, exploratory data analysis, data visualization, inference, modelling, effective communication results using programming language R.goal course enable students work fully reproducible data science project analysing dataset choice answering questions care .

heading: Acknowledements
text: introductory data science course based Mine Çetinkaya-Rundel’s excellent “Data Science Box” materials.website built bookdown.

heading: 1 Overview
text:
Hello!core content introductory data science course focuses ondata acquisition wrangling,exploratory data analysis,data visualization,inference,modelling, andeffective communication results.heavy emphasis placed consistent syntax (tools tidyverse), reproducibility (R Markdown), version control collaboration (Git GitHub).RStudio Cloud workspace course provided Moodle-Course.
join workspace use sample application exercises.

first application, conduct first data visualization.RStudio Cloud workspace course provided Moodle-Course.

heading: 3 Exploring data
text:
unit focuses data visualization data wrangling.
Specifically cover fundamentals data data visualization, confounding variables, Simpson’s paradox well concept tidy data, data import, data cleaning, data curation.end unit web scraping introduce idea iteration preparation next unit.Also unit introduce toolkit: R, RStudio, R Markdown, Git, GitHub.

heading: 4 Making rigorous conclusions
text: part introduce modelling statistical inference making data-based conclusions.discuss building, interpreting, selecting models, visualizing interaction effects, prediction model validation.Statistical inference introduced simulation based perspective, Central Limit Theorem discussed briefly lay foundation future coursework statistics.

heading: 5 Interactive tutorials
text:
following interactive tutorials built learnr gradethis.’re available shinyapps.io (linked) well distributed dsbox package.1
dsbox package installed, can also run tutorials Tutorials pane RStudio window.Tutorial 1: Airbnb listings EdinburghThe goal tutorial conduct thorough analysis Airbnb listings Edinburgh, instead give chance practice data visualisation interpretation skills.[Tutorial] [Source]Tutorial 2: Road Traffic AccidentsContinue practising data visualization skills ggplot2.Filter data certain attributes filter().Create new variables based existing variables data mutate().[Tutorial] [Source]Tutorial 3: major ?Continue practising data tidying visualisation.Calculate summary statistics summarise().Arrange output dplyr chains arrange().[Tutorial] [Source]Tutorial 4: Lego salesPractice analysis skills learned far.Develop question can answer data.Deepen understanding building interpreting visualisations.[Tutorial] [Source]Tutorial 5: Money US politicsGet started scraping data web.Continue build data cleaning visualisation skills.[Tutorial] [Source]Tutorial 6: Bike Rentals D.C.Continue hone data wrangling skills.Practice modelling interpreting model results performance.Conduct backwards selection finding “best” model.[Tutorial] [Source]Tutorial 7: Exploring General Social SurveyWork data manipulation skills.Fit linear models multiple predictors.Interpret regression output.[Tutorial] [Source]Tutorial 8: Bootstrapping General Social SurveyContinue hone data wrangling skills.Use bootstrapping construct confidence intervals.Interpret confidence intervals context data.[Tutorial] [Source]
